thread.section_title: KILL CLIFF Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KILL CLIFF | killcliff.com
thread.title: Maci Viggiani
thread.title_full: KILL CLIFF reviewed by Maci Viggiani

author: Maci Viggiani
title: Maci Viggiani
text:
Rather than paying for individual cans every time I go through a wicked WOD at my box, I decided to bite the bullet and purchase in [somewhat] bulk. Ordering was easy, and I got % discount for signing up for a newsletter which is fiiiine with me! It's not like this will be a "one and done" purchase.
My two seperate flavors were delivered 2 days apart, which was weird. Other than that, I'm totally pleased! Lemon Lime is BY FAR my favorite!
